definition: the property created by the space between two objects or points, go far ahead of
details:
noun
- the property created by the space between two objects or points
- size of the gap between two places
= example: size of the gap between two places
= synonyms: length
- indifference by personal withdrawal
= example: indifference by personal withdrawal
= synonyms: aloofness
- a distant region
= example: a distant region
- the interval between two times
= example: the interval between two times
= synonyms: space
- a remote point in time
= example: a remote point in time
verb
- go far ahead of
= example: go far ahead of
= synonyms: outstrip, outdistance
- keep at a distance
= example: keep at a distance
